details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.8 Extension schemas - Extension schema definition - valueType field
details.description: Field 'valueType' of the PDF/A Schema value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Seq ValueType and namespace prefix 'pdfaSchema'.

rule.description: Field 'valueType' of the PDF/A Schema value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Seq ValueType and namespace prefix 'pdfaSchema'.

error.message: Field 'valueType' of the PDF/A Schema value type doesn't have prefix 'pdfaSchema' (valueType prefix = %1) or doesn't have type Seq ValueType (isValueTypeValidSeq = %2)
